content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining operation at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) with fuel inventory {'coal': 44}
- Wooden chest (position (40.5, -83.5)) with inventory {'coal': 7}
- Wooden chest (position (41.5, -83.5)) with inventory {'coal': 435}
- Burner inserter (position (39.5, -81.5)) with fuel inventory {'coal': 22}

### Iron plate production at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with fuel inventory {'coal': 30} and result inventory {'iron-plate': 62}

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when mining with a full chest
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
### Errors when smelting without ingredients
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the process.
### Errors when using an inserter without source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to insert items.

### NAMESPACE
* Defined utility functions: None
* Important variables:
  - `coal`: integer, represents the amount of coal in the inventory
  - `iron_plate`: integer, represents the amount of iron plates in the inventory
  - `drill_status`: EntityStatus, represents the status of the burner mining drill
  - `inserter_status`: EntityStatus, represents the status of the burner inserter
  - `furnace_status`: EntityStatus, represents the status of the furnace
